Zelda: Dawn & Dusk (NAGE01)

$30 FPS Switch (Part 1) (Gecko Code) (NAGE01)
289F6BA8 00000008
2113D7B4 00000000
00002FC2 00000000
CC000000 00000001
00002FC2 00000001
E0000000 80008000
*Press D-Pad Up In-Game to toggle between 20 FPS and 30 FPS mode
*Set CPU Clock Override to 295% and use the Vulkan Backend
*Requires GameCube Controller
